thread.title: George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins
thread.title_full: George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins

author: PETER SBLENDORIO
title: George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins
text:
George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins, Julie Chen reports on 'The Talk' George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins  46 PM 
George and Amal Clooney are reportedly expecting twins. 
The A-list actor's wife is pregnant with two bundles of joy, host Julie Chen reported on Thursday's episode of "The Talk." 
"Beyoncé is not the only superstar expecting twins," she said on the CBS talk show. "Congratulations are in order for George and Amal Clooney." George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins. (Jordan Strauss/Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP) 
Beyoncé and Jay Z are expecting twins 
The new babies will be the first children for both George, 55, and the 39-year-old Amal, who married in 2014. Speculation had swirled in recent weeks around the possibility of Amal, a human rights attorney, being pregnant. 
Clooney, long known as one of Hollywood's most eligible bachelors, previously told CBS he still wasn't making becoming a father a priority after getting married. Happy Anniversary George and Amal Clooney! 
"I've thought about it I suppose, but I haven't really — it hasn't been high on my list, uh, I've been asked a lot lately because I've gotten married and I'm doing a movie with kids in it," he said in 2015. 
The report comes a little over a week after Beyoncé announced she and husband Jay Z are expecting twins. 
A rep for Clooney did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
